about_the_game:
"Jump on Clouds" is a whimsical adventure that invites players to leap through a vibrant sky filled with fluffy clouds and unexpected surprises. In this delightful game, you'll navigate through 30 levels of cloud-hopping fun. There is also infitity mode.

As you bound from cloud to cloud, you'll encounter a variety of entertaining events that add spice to your journey. Keep an eye out for mischievous cats, adorable anime girls, and even the occasional appearance of everyone's favorite green ogre, Shrеg! These unexpected encounters not only keep you on your toes but also add a dash of humor and excitement to your cloud-hopping escapades.

But it's not just the quirky events that make "Jump on Clouds" a delight to play. The game also features dynamic weather systems in infinity mode that affect your gameplay. From sunny skies to rainy and windy weather, each weather condition presents its own set of challenges, requiring you to adapt your jumping strategy to stay on course.

In addition to the engaging gameplay, "Jump on Clouds" offers players the opportunity to customize their experience with a variety of UI designs. Whether you prefer a sleek, minimalist light-blue interface or a colorful aesthetic, you can tailor the game's look to suit your style and mood.

But it's not just the quirky events that make "Jump on Clouds" a delight to play. The game also features dynamic weather systems in infinity mode that affect your gameplay. From sunny skies to rainy and windy weather, each weather condition presents its own set of challenges, requiring you to adapt your jumping strategy to stay on course.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Graphics: GTX 680
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Jump on clouds

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 680
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

short_description: “Jump on the Clouds” is a relaxing platformer in an endless world. There's only one reason to play: to relax and de-stress.
supported_languages: English, Russian, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Polish, Romanian, Ukrainian, Finnish, Swedish, Japanese
